verses.verse: I will stand <WH5975> at my watch, <WH4931> and set <WH3320> myself on the ramparts, <WH4692> and will look <WH7200> out to see <WH7200> what he will say <WH1696> to me, <WH7725> and what I will answer concerning my complaint. <WH8433>
Yahweh <WH3068> answered <WH6030> me, <WH3789> "Write the vision, <WH2377> and make it plain <WH874> on tablets, <WH3871> that he who runs <WH7323> may read it. <WH7121>

For the vision <WH2377> is yet for the appointed time, <WH4150> and it hurries toward the end, <WH7093> and won't <WH6315> prove false. <WH3576> Though it takes time, <WH4102> wait <WH4102> for it; <WH935> because it will surely come. <WH935> It won't <WH309> delay.
Behold, <WH5315> his soul is puffed up. <WH6075> It is not upright <WH3474> in him, <WH6662> but the righteous will live <WH2421> by his faith. <WH530>

Yes, <WH3196> moreover, wine is treacherous. <WH898> A haughty <WH3093> man <WH1397> who doesn't <WH5115> stay at home, who enlarges <WH7337> his desire <WH5315> as Sheol, <WH7585> and he is like death, <WH4194> and can't <WH7646> be satisfied, but gathers <WH622> to himself all nations, <WH1471> and heaps <WH6908> to himself all peoples. <WH5971>

Won't <WH5375> all these take up a parable <WH4912> against him, <WH4426> and a taunting proverb <WH2420> against him, <WH559> and say, <WH1945> 'Woe to him who increases <WH7235> that which is not his, <WH3513> and who enriches himself by extortion! <WH5671> How long?'
Won't <WH5391> your debtors rise up <WH6965> suddenly, <WH6621> and wake <WH3364> up those who make you tremble, <WH2111> and you will be their victim? <WH4933>

Because you have plundered <WH7997> many <WH7227> nations, <WH1471> all the remnant <WH3499> of the peoples <WH5971> will plunder <WH7997> you, <WH120> because of men's blood, <WH1818> and for the violence <WH2555> done to the land, <WH776> to the city <WH7151> and to all who dwell in it. <WH3427>

Woe <WH1945> to him who gets <WH1214> an evil <WH7451> gain <WH1215> for his house, <WH1004> that he may set <WH7760> his nest <WH7064> on high, <WH4791> that he may be delivered <WH5337> from the hand <WH3709> of evil! <WH7451>
You have devised <WH3289> shame <WH1322> to your house, <WH1004> by cutting off <WH7096> many <WH7227> peoples, <WH5971> and have sinned <WH2398> against your soul. <WH5315>
For the stone <WH68> will cry out <WH2199> of the wall, <WH7023> and the beam <WH6086> out <WH3714> of the woodwork will answer it. <WH6030>
Woe <WH1945> to him who builds <WH1129> a town <WH5892> with blood, <WH1818> and establishes <WH3559> a city <WH7151> by iniquity! <WH5766>

Behold, <WH3068> isn't it of Yahweh of Armies <WH6635> that the peoples <WH5971> labor <WH3021> for the <WH1767> fire, <WH784> and the nations <WH3816> weary <WH3286> themselves for <WH1767> vanity? <WH7385>
For the earth <WH776> will be filled <WH4390> with the knowledge <WH3045> of the glory <WH3519> of Yahweh, <WH3068> as the waters <WH4325> cover <WH3680> the sea. <WH3220>

"Woe <WH1945> to him who gives his neighbor <WH7453> drink, <WH8248> pouring <WH5596> your inflaming wine <WH2573> until they are drunk, <WH7937> so that you may gaze <WH5027> at their naked bodies! <WH4589>

You are filled <WH7646> with shame, <WH7036> and not glory. <WH3519> You will also drink, <WH8354> and be exposed! <WH6188> The cup <WH3563> of Yahweh <WH3068>'s right hand <WH3225> will come around <WH5437> to you, <WH7022> and disgrace will cover your glory. <WH3519>

For the violence <WH2555> done to Lebanon <WH3844> will overwhelm <WH3680> you, <WH7701> and the destruction of the animals, <WH929> which made them afraid; <WH2865> because of men <WH120>'s blood, <WH1818> and for the violence <WH2555> done to the land, <WH776> to every city <WH7151> and to those who dwell in them. <WH3427>

"What value does the engraved <WH6458> image <WH6459> have, <WH3335> that its maker has engraved <WH6458> it; <WH4541> the molten image, even the teacher <WH3384> of lies, <WH8267> that he who fashions <WH3335> its form <WH3336> trusts <WH982> in it, <WH6213> to make mute <WH483> idols? <WH457>

Woe <WH1945> to him who says <WH559> to the wood, <WH6086> <WH6974> 'Awake!' or to the mute <WH1748> stone, <WH68> <WH5782> 'Arise!' Shall this teach? <WH3384> Behold, <WH8610> it is overlaid with gold <WH2091> and silver, <WH3701> and there is no breath <WH7307> at all in its midst. <WH7130>
But Yahweh <WH3068> is in his holy <WH6944> temple. <WH1964> Let all the earth <WH776> be silent <WH2013> before him! <WH6440>"
